attributes.action: As per the smoking while driving petition make all distractions illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Along with smoking I would include all activities which can cause traffic accidents so please make it illegal to Smoke, Talk, Dink, Eat, Singing, Listening to music and distractions like other people in cars completely illegal.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
